goal: Login, add backpack to cart, and checkout
docs: Login with 'standard_user' and 'secret_sauce'. Add 'Sauce Labs Backpack' to cart. Click Cart. Checkout. Fill dummy info. Finish.
Click 'Start'. Wait for loading bar to finish. Verify 'Hello World!' text appears.
Select 'Option 2' in Radio Button. Type 'Ind' in Autosuggest and select 'India'. Check 'Option 1' checkbox. Show/Hide input field.
Search for 'shoe'. Click on 'Skinsheen Bronzer Stick' (or any result). Add to cart.
Click 'Customer Login'. Select 'Harry Potter'. Click Login. Click 'Deposit'. Enter 1000. Submit.

goal: Navigate to Big Page and interact with elements
docs: Click 'Big page with many elements'. If fails, scroll to 'Complicated Page'.
Fill all fields: Name, Email, Gender (Radio), Mobile. Submit.
Click Register. Fill Form. Login. Verify Account Overview.
